Plot: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.
Title: Thirteen
Actors: Nikki Reed, Evan Rachel Wood, Vanessa Hudgens, Holly Hunter
tomatoConsensus: An emotionally wrenching, not to mention terrifying, film about the perils of being a teenager.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 45 nominations.
